mapper.select: SELECT A.parent_area_id as areaId ,A.area_id as targetId ,A.area_name as targetName ,'area' as deviceCode ,'Y' as deviceStat ,'' as linkUrl ,'N' as mainFlag ,B.use_yn as useYn ,B.x1 as x1 ,B.x2 as x2 ,B.y1 as y1 ,B.y2 as y2 FROM isaver.area A LEFT OUTER JOIN isaver.custom_map_location B ON A.area_id = B.target_id AND B.area_id = #{areaId} WHERE A.parent_area_id = #{areaId} AND A.del_yn = 'N' AND A.template_code = 'TMP005' UNION ALL SELECT A.area_id as areaId ,A.device_id as targetId ,A.device_name as targetName ,A.device_code as deviceCode ,A.device_stat as deviceStat ,A.link_url as linkUrl ,A.main_flag as mainFlag ,B.use_yn as useYn ,B.x1 as x1 ,B.x2 as x2 ,B.y1 as y1 ,B.y2 as y2 FROM isaver.device A LEFT OUTER JOIN isaver.custom_map_location B ON A.device_id = B.target_id AND B.area_id = #{areaId} WHERE A.area_id = #{areaId} AND A.device_code in ('DEV002','DEV006','DEV007','DEV008','DEV013') AND A.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY deviceCode, targetName
